data.title: LynLake Centers for WellBeing
data.meta_description: Meet Sharon Burris-Brown, team member of Lyn-Lake Psychotherapy and Wellness – helping you explore and expand your whole self.
data.text:
Sharon Burris-Brown

She/Her/Them/They

NOW ACCEPTING NEW CLIENTS

Sharon’s intention is to provide a safe, supportive environment within the therapeutic relationship. Her philosophy is strengths-based and holistic: she believes people have the capacity for resilience, creativity and resourcefulness. Her role is to help her clients get to that place of knowing this for themselves so they can move forward in their lives and thrive.

She is trained in mindfulness-based-stress reduction, and is a Board-Certified Health and Wellness Coach who has worked with a wide range of people on improving self-care and creating lifestyle habits that support their mental health. Currently, she works with adults 18+. Sharon weaves in a coaching approach with her clients. In addition, she utilizes mindfulness and body-oriented strategies to help clients accept all parts of themselves including intense emotions and inner experiences--no matter how challenging with tenderness and self-compassion.

Get in Touch

We’ll work with you every step of the way to make your experience as clear and welcoming as possible. If you’re ready to start the next chapter of your journey, you can request to get connected to our referrals specialist now.

Request an Appointment
